JOB DESCRIPTION: Project   Description      Software development for the core and edge features running the latest hardware platforms released by a major enterprise networks equipment provider      Responsibilities     Networking enthusiasts willing to contribute to customer success    Technologies used : L2/L3 switching platforms, switching routing protocols, network OAM, Cloud Integration, network security    Opportunities - Networking testing certifications, collaboration with an international team, working with the latest networking technologies and concepts, access to training     Responsibilities:     Code development based on a defined schedule.    Unit testing of developed code.    Support for Product Verification activities.      Skills    Must Have     Experience in C language programming    Knowledge of Unix/Linux and real-time OS    Good understanding of Ethernet and IP network protocols    Atleast 3+ years of experience in embedded software development, preferably for network equipment     Nice to Have     Understanding multi-process system software architectures    Knowledgeable in version control systems (GIT, Clearcase)    Experience working on Linux OS    Experience in tests creation for developed modules      Languages :   English: B2 Upper Intermediate
